price: Ona: "Cennet'e gir!" denildi. O da: "Keşke kavmim bilseydi." dedi.
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
